title: The shepheards oracles delivered in certain eglogues. By Fra: Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: printed by M.F. for John Marriot and Richard Marriot, and are to be sold at their shop in S. Dunstans Church-yard Fleetstreet, under the Dyall,
notes: Thomason received his copy on December 2, 1645; Wing has 1646.
With an added engraved title page, with title: The shepherds oracles.
Includes: Quarles, Francis.  The shepheards oracle (Wing Q114) as 11th eglogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 2d 1645"; the 6 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Bodleian Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
